title: Enterprise Blockchain: Changes in future implementations — Presented by Unbound Tech | Full Video
content: On November 10th Frank Chaparro was joined by leaders from Unbound Tech, IBM, and Citi Ventures to discuss enterprise blockchain within financial institutions.
